attributes.action: Create accountabilty to companies that charge for parking.
attributes.additional_details:
There are hundreds if not thousands of reported incidents reported to our (guardians) the police. 
I strongly ask you ask for incident reports . 
If just curious 1st  ? Examine f/b truckers pages . You will find curtain slashing and robbery in services almost every day.  

We can sleep in peace and rest is an important part of our job .
attributes.background:
I've had my truck robbed as have 100s of drivers in recent months . If not robbed damage to trucks with these thieves looking to see whats inside . 
Charging so much MUST carry accountabilty . 


We ask the goverment to provide safe places to sleep .

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. In particular, we're not sure what you mean by "create accountability". 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. 

If you'd like there to be a legal requirement for motorway service areas to provide security for visiting HGVs at night, you may wish to sign this petition instead: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/217696
